divs: sighting detailslast night i took my kids to the "marfa mamy lights" (thats what we call them)to see if they were out & sure enough they were. this time i got really scared because it seemed as if they were coming closer& closer to me so i'd turn on my headlights &they'd back off. there were several different ones, but at one time there were 3 as in the shape of a triangle, then they vanished, then they came back. some blinked others were always bright, others seemed to get brightern them dim down n then brite agagin n move up, down, left, right, sometimes fast n othertimes slow. i have been seeing these "things" for approx. 5-6 mos. they r more active when there is no moon. its crazy, idk what they could be but it's going to drive me crazy til this isinvestigated n explained. come n see them, it's like they like company i think, but i dont ever get out of my car cuz idk what they r or what they r capable of. please come n help me find a logical explanation 2 all this crazyness i've discovered. thank you, (name moved to fi box ) 10\28\11 21:23 cst flg
